The Open Championship Golf Travel Packages

Experience the 150th British Open Championship at St. Andrews’ historic Old Course. Our bespoke 2022 British Open travel packages are designed to each traveler’s preferences and can include exclusive accommodations at Craigsanquhar Scottish Country Estate (located just six miles from St. Andrews), comprehensive 4-day British Open experience with daily VIP hospitality including great food and a complimentary bar, airport and course transfers, and much more. Our friendly and knowledgeable on-site host will be available to assist with any questions or requests while abroad. It’s the ultimate luxury experience at one of the biggest golf tournaments in the world.

Custom 5-night 2022 British Open packages are available from $7,845 per person, based on availability.

About the 2022 British Open Championship

The British Open will celebrate its 150th anniversary at the perfect venue. Dubbed the ‘home of golf,’ there is no course better suited to host this illustrious tournament than The Old Course at St. Andrews. This stunning course and its rich history will impress both fans and golfers at this exclusive championship, leaving memories that will be treasured and shared for a lifetime. As the best of golf gather on the world’s stage, be sure you’re there to celebrate the tradition, the athleticism, and the anticipation of seeing who will walk away as this year’s champion at the tournament’s sesquicentennial.
